about_the_game:
* New crop: Celery
* New Tree: Persimmon
* New outfit with four different skins
* New hat
* New tractor: Bumper Car
* New antenna: Bumper Car Antenna
* New farm decorations: Merry-Go-Round, Swing Carousel, High Striker, Rocking Unicorn, Fortune-Teller Wagon, Circus Wagon, Swan Boat, Circus Ball and 6-sided Die
* New road: Circus Carpet
* New fence: Velvet Fence (with three different skins)
* New house: Circus Tent
* New house decoration: Card Castle
detailed_description:
* New crop: Celery
* New Tree: Persimmon
* New outfit with four different skins
* New hat
* New tractor: Bumper Car
* New antenna: Bumper Car Antenna
* New farm decorations: Merry-Go-Round, Swing Carousel, High Striker, Rocking Unicorn, Fortune-Teller Wagon, Circus Wagon, Swan Boat, Circus Ball and 6-sided Die
* New road: Circus Carpet
* New fence: Velvet Fence (with three different skins)
* New house: Circus Tent
* New house decoration: Card Castle

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.12+
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Farm Together - Celery Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Plenty of circus themed content for Farm Together, such as new outfits, decorations and farm items to plant and harvest!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Russian, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Hungarian, Japanese, Thai, Danish, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Czech, Korean
